name: Microwave Beef Lasagne Plates with Green Beans and Warm Garlic Baguette
description: Heat-and-eat beef lasagne with quick-steamed green beans and a microwaved garlic baguette. Kid-friendly with zero chili heat and ready in under 15 minutes.
prep_steps: Remove film/lids from the beef lasagne ready meal trays per pack directions.
Rinse green beans and trim the ends.
Slice the garlic baguette into thick slices (or keep whole if pre-sliced).
Set out a large microwave-safe bowl with a microwave-safe plate to use as a cover.
cook_steps: Microwave the first beef lasagne tray according to pack instructions (typically 4–6 minutes on high), rotate or stir if directed, and let stand 1 minute. Repeat with the second tray.
Add green beans to the bowl with 2 tablespoons water. Cover with the microwave-safe plate and microwave 3–4 minutes until crisp-tender. Drain and season lightly with salt.
Wrap garlic baguette slices loosely in a clean, slightly damp paper towel and microwave 30–60 seconds until warm (or microwave the whole baguette 45–90 seconds).
Plate lasagne portions, add green beans on the side, and serve with warm garlic baguette.
